title: Bug splat und leaverbuster
body: I had a bugsplat and after it was repaired i got a message from riot (leaverbuster) and it's not the first time. I need help because i don't want to wait 20 minutes to play league otherwise im gonna delete it.

replies.body:
I am sorry to tell you this, but you can't do anything about your leavebuster.

However, you can do sth. about your bugsplats:

Download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/articles/224826367-Automatisierte-Fehlerbehebung-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and let it repair your client. (Make sure to check "Force Repatch", otherwise it just controlls your settings.)

Btw.: You are posting on the german boards, you can find the english boards [here](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en).

PS.: Da du "Bug splat **und** leaverbuster" als Titel hast, vermute ich dass du Deutsch bist. In diesem Fall: Schreib beim nächsten Mal einfach direkt auf Deutsch, ansonsten poste über den oberen Link auf den englischen Boards.
